title: Raspberry cheesecake slices
ingredients: ['300g frozen raspberries, thawed', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '150g digestive biscuits, finely crushed', '4 tablespoons butter or margarine, melted', '450g cream cheese, softened', '1 (397g) tin condensed sweetened milk', '2 eggs', '5 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
